text: Lolita Davidovich (born 15 July 1961) is a Canadian actress. She has had many notable movie roles. She played Blaze Starr in the 1989 movie Blaze. She was in the 1991 movie JFK. She also acted in the television series The L Word. Davidovich was born near London, Ontario. ==Other websites== * * Category:Canadian movie actors Category:1961 births Category:Living people
title: Lolita Davidovich
